(mountain-survival [mountainsurvival], forest-survival [forestsurvival])

item slots [slots]: 2 hands, head, body, feet, 2 misc
Wolves are common in the Black Forest and have caused much harm to the peasant population. Wolfherds are skilled animal trainers who capture wolves and breed and train them for herding, hunting and warfare. They are not very good at leading human soldiers.
